1. "The Stars My Destination" (1955) - This classic anime follows a retired Russian soldier named Eiji Onodera (Keishi Suenaga). He embarks on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

2. "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III" (1993) - The third installment of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles series, this anime follows the adventures of four ninja turtles: Leonardo Turtle (Kenichi Honda); Michelangelo Turtle (Hiroshi Tanaka); Raphael Turtle (Kyoji Yamada). They travel to various locations in Japan, including Hokkaido, to investigate and stop various criminal activities that are happening at that time.

3. "Elysium" (2013) - This science fiction anime follows the story of an ex-policeman named Dan Jackson (Jason Momoa). He is sent on a mission to a space station called Elysium (Alexandria O'Hare). There, he meets different people who are living on the space station. They have different backgrounds and circumstances. Some of them are trying to escape from Earth or some other planet that they are living in. Others of them are trying to find answers to some of the most important questions that humanity has ever faced.
